issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: YARN-8501 refactor the RMWebService#getApp. Similar refactoring required in AHSWebservice.
fields.summary: Reduce complexity of AHSWebService getApps method

comments.body:
Hi [~rohithsharma]!
If you don't mind I will take this forward and provide a patch soon.
Thanks!

Hi [~rohithsharma]!
First patch is ready for review!
I performed a similar refactor like in RMWebServices, i.e. building the GetAppRequest with the builder.
The loop iterating on appReports with plenty of continue statements still looks pretty bad but I think that's not in the scope of this jira.
Thanks [~snemeth] for taking time and helping to do this. I will help to review this patch.
Thanks [~sunilg] for jumping in for the review.
Re-uploading patch, somehow yetus did not recognize the initial patch yet.

Hi [~rohithsharma], [~sunilg]: This is here for a while now.
Could you please help with reviewing or do you know someone else who would have time for review?
Thanks!
